title: reportbug command? (or `wtf --report`)
body:
#### What is the problem?

Wtf output is now even longer with #2865 . We all to paste it into the issue which adds pages of scrolling. We need to add an option to post it online and just provide a URL within bug report.

  <summary>WTF</summary>
